tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (VP (VBG Being) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN reason)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (DT a) (NN friend) (POS 's)) (NN smile))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [reason/NN cop>Being/VBG det>the/DT nmod:of>[smile/NN case>of/IN nmod:poss>[friend/NN det>a/DT case>'s/POS]] punct>./.]
